attributes.action: SNP Office to be investigated for miss use of Tax payers money.
attributes.additional_details:
With the mass amount of press reports of the SNP office using Tax payers money to fund their Independence campaign and the accusation that the SNP used £103,000.00 of Tax Payers Money to keep details from getting published by a Reporting News Paper on Independent Scotland's Income Tax.
Also Investigate the accusations of Contacts on Edinburgh Tram Project Fraudulently awarded and the Millions of Pounds it over ran it's budget on that Tax payers will be expected to pay back.
Also to be Investigated is the Ryder Cup Lavish £400,000.00 expense claim of the SNP and the £95,000.00 on a party at Edinburgh Castle hosted by Alexander Salmond. Also to be Investigated is the Final cost of the Alexander Salmond cost of Tax Payers Money and on who's approval sanctioned the SNP Scotland's Future White Book would be paid by Tax Payers Money. We all demand a full Audit on all the SNP spending and Financial Book Keeping and who approved the lavish freedom to spend our Taxes at the SNP office.
